Title: Orphans
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), James Wong, John J. Gray (story editor), Crystal Liu (staff writer), Todd Kubrak (script coordinator)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Michael Chiklis, Frances Conroy
Plot: A death at the camp causes Elsa to seek out a new home for Pepper. Meanwhile, Desiree has enough of Dell's failure as a husband, and Stanley lends Jimmy a hand.
